metadata.title: CVE-2019-13638 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU patch through 2.7.6 is vulnerable to OS shell command injection thatcan be exploited by opening a crafted patch file that contains an ed stylediff payload with shell metacharacters. The ed editor does not need to bepresent on the vulnerable system. This is different from CVE-2018-1000156.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13638` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

patch - 2.7.6-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: patch package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.6-2ubuntu1.1').
